definition: "walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
to pass the winter/to overwinter/to live through the winter
wax gourd (Cucurbitaceae, Benincasa hispida)/white gourd/white hairy melon/Chinese squash
Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January
the four seasons/spring, summer, autumn and winter

sentences.english: Winter cold wind, moon Leng Xing rare.
They told that Professor Liu would have been teaching here for twenty years by this winter.
sentences.chinese: 他們說到今年冬天時劉教授在這裏教書要滿二十年了。

sentences.english: Echeveria agavoides grows in a certain area of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 景天科擬石蓮花屬植物冬雲生長在墨西哥特定的區域。

sentences.english: People often decorate their houses with holly at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 人們總是在聖誕節時用冬青來裝飾房屋。

sentences.english: By the time the daffodil is out of blossom , winter is about to retire.
sentences.chinese: 當黃水仙是在開花外面的時候，冬天將退休。

sentences.english: In the winter, perspiration permeated through all over his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 冬天時，他的汗從內裏透出外衣，汗漬斑斑。

sentences.english: Many traditional dishes in Japan have a soup base, like miso soup and udon noodles.
sentences.chinese: 日本傳統佳餚都會搭配湯類，如味增湯和烏冬麪。

sentences.english: The Ket allowed their reindeer to wander during summer and kept them close to camp during winter.
sentences.chinese: 偈人讓馴鹿在夏天遊放，冬天將其留在營地附近。

sentences.english: If unused, winter radishes run to seed in spring .
sentences.chinese: 如果不去動的話，冬蘿蔔會在春天開花結籽。

sentences.english: It keeps doctor away that eat turnip in winter and eat ginger in summer.
sentences.chinese: 冬喫蘿蔔夏吃薑，不用醫生開藥方。

sentences.english: When forty winters shall besiege thy brow.
sentences.chinese: 四十個冬天將圍攻你的額角。

sentences.english: The old peasant conjectured that it would be an unusually cold winter.
sentences.chinese: 那老農推測冬天將會異常地寒冷。

sentences.english: Holly, with its sharply pointed leaves, symbolised the thorns in Christ's crown-of-thorns.
sentences.chinese: 尖尖的冬青葉樹象徵着耶穌帶刺的冠冕。

sentences.english: In the winter, throw open the curtains during the day.
sentences.chinese: 冬天時白天將窗簾打開。

definition: to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
